entry.title: Axie Infinity’s Ronin Bridge Exploited For More Than $600M
entry.summary: The Ronin Bridge that connects Axie Infinity’s Ronin sidechain to Ethereum has been drained of 173,600 ETH ($590M) and 25.5M USDC in what may be DeFi’s biggest exploit yet.
